content: extra or less isn t going to change the look of the hair that much arms pale green 5mm hook make 2 1 single_crochet 5 into magic_ring 2 increase around 10 3 increase single_crochet around 15 4-12 single_crochet around 9r of 15 13 single_crochet 7 half_double_crochet 8 15 14 slip_stitch flo 7 half_double_crochet 8 15 15 slip_stitch into next ch1 turn half_double_crochet 8 slip_stitch into next r13-15 create the shoulder fo leave tail for sewing stuff arms & sew to sides of body just under the neck legs pale green 5mm hook make 2 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4-15 single_crochet around 12r of 18 fo leave tail for sewing stuff legs & sew to the bottom of the body ears pale green 5mm hook make 2 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet around 12 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing flatten ears & sew to the sides of the head scarf red 3 5mm hook 1 ch70 half_double_crochet into 2nd chain from hook & the next 67 68 2 ch2 half_double_crochet 68 fo weave in ends cut eight 2 inch strands then slip_stitch four into each end to make fringe tie scarf around the neck if you prefer to crochet the eyes - crochet eyes black 5mm hook make 2 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 4 single_crochet around 15 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing add a small amount of stuffing under the eyes when sewing on to make them bulge out a little bit
